name: Rocket Game Prototype
description:
Control the world's first and only space-mouse and its spaceship! Funding for the space program was limited so the researchers at UNNAMED SPACE EXPLORATION ORGANIZATION built a mouse-piloted spaceship to explore the stars...

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Spacebar - Jump
Escape - Restart
Alt+F4 - Quit the game

Came up with the idea while simultaneously moving out, so time was quite limited. Unfortunately didn't have any time for sounds... I think it's an idea that could go quite a ways! Was thinking of adding random tilt, asteroids to avoid, enemies that could stun the mouse, and a boppin 8 or 16 bit soundtrack. Not sure if it'd be better as a "How high can you get?" kind of game, or a level-based spaceship navigation game with more stuff thrown at the player as they progress....

Hopefully someone gets inspired or likes the idea, please let me know if you have any thoughts or comments!
